member.name: T:Engine.Core.SimulationEngine
member.summary:
The central singleton that drives the entire simulation. It maintains the device registry, owns the tick-based time model, and manages the priority queue of in-flight packets.
Every call to advances the simulation by one step: the tick counter is incremented, wall-clock delta time is measured, all subscribers to are notified, and any packets whose has been reached are dequeued and dispatched to their device.
